level.text: Whenever a party to a proceeding under this chapter has the right or is required to perform some act within a specified time period after the service of notice upon the party, and the notice is served upon that party by mail, three (3) days shall be added to the prescribed period.
Except as otherwise provided by law, any time period prescribed by this chapter may, for good cause shown, be extended or shortened by the Board with notice to all parties.
